content.en: Water resource optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve water resources management under uncertainty. They have been using various algorithms to address different research questions, such as determining optimal water resource management policies, planning water resources management systems, and optimizing water allocation plans. These algorithms, such as fuzzy multiobjective programming, genetic algorithms, and fuzzy-boundary interval-stochastic programming, help in making decisions and optimizing water resource allocation in the face of multiple uncertainties.
content.da: Optimering af vandressourcer: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre forvaltningen af vandressourcer under usikkerhed. De har brugt forskellige algoritmer til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål, såsom at bestemme optimale politikker for vandressourceforvaltning, planlægge systemer til forvaltning af vandressourcer og optimere vandallokeringsplaner. Disse algoritmer, såsom fuzzy multiobjektiv programmering, genetiske algoritmer og fuzzy-grænse interval-stokastisk programmering, hjælper med at træffe beslutninger og optimere vandallokering på trods af flere usikkerheder.
